## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have run `dart analyze` and resolved all issues
- [ ] I have run `dart format` on my code
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] My code is properly commented, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have removed any debug code, console logs, or commented-out code

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments (dartdoc) where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md file
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated examples in the `/example` directory

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have checked that my changes don't break existing tests
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased (or is justified)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have checked that any new dependencies are necessary
- [ ] I have updated `pubspec.yaml` with appropriate version constraints
- [ ] All dependencies are compatible with the minimum Dart SDK version
- [ ] I have documented any new dependencies in the README or documentation

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] This PR does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] If breaking changes exist, I have documented them in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] If breaking changes exist, I have provided a migration guide
- [ ] I have updated the version number according to semantic versioning

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, passwords, tokens) is included
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where necessary
- [ ] SQL injection and XSS vulnerabilities are addressed
